p.k: Comedy, Horror Usa (1960). Hrají: Dick Miller, Dodie Drake, Jack Nicholson, Jackie Joseph, Jonathan Haze, Leola Wendorff, Lynn Storey, Mel Welles, Myrtle Vail, Toby Michaels. Režie: Roger Corman.
p.d: A clumsy young man nurtures a plant and discovers that it's a bloodthirsty plant, forcing him to kill to feed it.
